author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TODAY IS THE LAST FULL DAY FOR FLORIDA RESIDENTS TO GET THEIR  FAMILIES AND HOMES READY AND EVACUATE IF TOLD TO DO SO BY LOCAL  OFFICIALS...
summary:
...TODAY IS THE LAST FULL DAY FOR FLORIDA RESIDENTS TO GET THEIR  FAMILIES AND HOMES READY AND EVACUATE IF TOLD TO DO SO BY LOCAL  OFFICIALS...
 As of 10:00 AM CDT Tue Oct 8
 the center of Milton was located near 22.7, -88.4
 with movement ENE at 9 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 929 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 150 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Milton (AT4/AL142024)
